title: Dragon Circuits
description: Dragon fire distributed through strands of elvin steel for heating and light.

title: Troll Bone Chalk
description: Words written on stone with troll bones can be read in darkness.

title: Cavern Dust
description: Dust from the underworld sprinkled on the head at dawn induces educational visions.

title: Warlock Moonlight
description: When tampered with by warlocks moonlight becomes a delectable flavorant and an excellent perservative.

title: Ghosts
description: Can fit into tight spaces and have nimble fingers.

title: Hag Blood Dough
description: Stores tremendous amounts of energy that's released upon firm palpation.
